data.title: Smart recording flow: MPRIS pause + hardware gain calibration + restore

data.body: Cost evaluated: ~6h for v1 (MPRIS pause/resume + wpctl gain save/raise/restore + daemon orchestration). No new deps. wpctl confirmed installed, pydbus already present. Auto-calibration deferred to v2.

ia-bridge audit complete. Key refinements: check CanPause before Pause(), track paused_by_us set, pin to concrete wpctl node ID, max(current,target) for gain, skip if muted, crash recovery to /run/user/UID/whisperaloud-gain.json. New module media_control.py. RecordingFlowConfig with raise_mic_gain=False by default. V2: MPRIS signal subscription, unmute handling, pydbus timeouts.

Implemented. RecordingFlowConfig added to config.py with full to_dict/from_dict/env-override support. media_control.py has MprisController (CanPause check, paused_by_us tracking, resume-if-still-paused) and GainController (wpctl node pinning, max(current,target), muted skip, crash recovery file). daemon.py wired: bus injected post-publish, StartRecording pauses+raises, StopRecording/Cancel restore+resume. 22 new tests all passing. 412 total passing.
